sense.gloss: fixing (in place), being fixed (in place), securing, anchoring, fastening down
fixing (e.g. salary, capital), keeping the same
user name (on an online forum like 2ch where the majority of users post anonymously)
user of an online handle (instead of posting anonymously)
characteristic, traditional, peculiar, inherent, native, eigen-
lump, mass, bundle, clump, clod, cluster
embodiment (of an idea, quality, feeling etc.), personification
somewhat hard, somewhat firm, fairly hard, on the hard side
strong, firm (not viscous or easily moved)
sticking to (an opinion, theory, belief, etc.), clinging to, adherence, persistence, insistence

sdata.j: チーズは、ウシ、ヤギ、ヒツジやその↑他↑↓た↓の↑哺乳類↑↓ほにゅうるい↓の↑乳↑↓ちち↓から↑作↑↓つく↓られる↑固形↑↓こけい↓の↑食↑↓た↓べ↑物↑↓もの↓だ。
sdata.e: Cheese is a solid food made from the milk of cows, goats, sheep, and other mammals.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑断固↑↓だんこ↓として↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑要求↑↓ようきゅう↓を↑拒絶↑↓きょぜつ↓すべきであった。
sdata.e: You should have refused his request flatly.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑主張↑↓しゅちょう↓は、ぼくの↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓↑親父↑↓おやじ↓のと↑同↑↓おな↓じく↑納得↑↓なっとく↓できない。
sdata.e: Your argument is not any more convincing than that of my stubborn father.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓がいくら↑笑↑↓わら↓っても、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓はあくまでも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑案↑↓あん↓を↑固守↑↓こしゅ↓します。
sdata.e: Laugh as much as you like; I'll stick to my plan to the bitter end.

sdata.j: ↑牛乳↑↓ぎゅうにゅう↓は↑凍↑↓こお↓って↑固↑↓かた↓まった。
sdata.e: The milk froze and became solid.

sdata.j: ↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓が↑健康↑↓けんこう↓に↑悪↑↓わる↓いと↑言↑↓い↓う↑確固↑↓かっこ↓たる↑証拠↑↓しょうこ↓がある。
sdata.e: We have absolute proof that smoking is bad for your health.

sdata.j: ↑気宇↑↓きう↓↑壮大↑↓そうだい↓な↑計画↑↓けいかく↓もいいけれど、まずは↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑足元↑↓あしもと↓を↑固↑↓かた↓めることから↑始↑↓はじ↓めてほしいよ。
sdata.e: It's fine to make grandiose plans, but I'd like you to start with what you have on your plate.

sdata.j: ↑基礎↑↓きそ↓を↑固↑↓かた↓めることは↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓です。
sdata.e: It is important to strengthen the basis.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑徹↑↓てっ↓のボスだと↑思↑↓おも↓っていたけれど、↑結構↑↓けっこう↓かわいいところもあるじゃない。
sdata.e: I thought our boss was stubborn as a mule but actually he has his cute side.

sdata.j: ↑頑固↑↓がんこ↓になればなるほど↑独立↑↓どくりつ↓するよ。
sdata.e: The more stubborn you are, the more isolated you become.

words.gloss: fixing (in place), being fixed (in place), securing, anchoring, fastening down
characteristic, traditional, peculiar, inherent, native, eigen-
